TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DialogResult extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies identifiers to indicate the return value of a dialog box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method use this enumeration.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> with the options supported by this overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>. After verifying that a string variable, `ServerName`, is empty, the example displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>, offering the user the option to cancel the operation. If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> method's return value evaluates to Yes, the form that displayed the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> is closed.
[!code-cs[MessageBox.Show Variations#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.d_51_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[MessageBox.Show Variations#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.d_51_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[MessageBox.Show Variations#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.d_51_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult Abort = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The dialog box return value is (usually sent from a button labeled Abort).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult Cancel = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The dialog box return value is (usually sent from a button labeled Cancel).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult Ignore = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The dialog box return value is (usually sent from a button labeled Ignore).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult No = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The dialog box return value is (usually sent from a button labeled No).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: is returned from the dialog box. This means that the modal dialog continues running.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult OK = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The dialog box return value is (usually sent from a button labeled OK).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult Retry = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The dialog box return value is (usually sent from a button labeled Retry).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult Yes = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The dialog box return value is (usually sent from a button labeled Yes).
